msDesc.head: Documents relating to the Franciscans of the Observance; Italy, 16th century, early

msItem.title: Ceremonial
msItem.rubric: Incipiunt constitutiones seu ordinationes circa divium officium
msItem.note: Ed. H. Golubovich, Archivum Franciscanum Historicum 3 (1910), pp. 51–81; with (fol. 5) additions made 'in capitulo generali Methis celebrato', but not pr. with the liturgical legislation of the counicl of Metz in Wadding, Annales III.209; and (fol. 5v) additions made at the council of Pisa, 1263, pr. Golubovich, A.F.H. 4 (1911), pp. 62–73, differing from the printed text from c. 26 onwards.

msItem.author: Haymo of Faversham
msItem.title: Ceremonial
msItem.rubric: Incipit ordo agendorum et dicendorum a sacerdote in missa secundum consuetudinem ecclesie Romane
msItem.explicit: benedicat vos Pater et Filius Amen
msItem.note: Ed. V. L. Kennedy, Mediaeval Studies 2 (1940), 218–22
List of feasts and fasts to be observed

msItem.title: Statutes of the Franciscan General Chapter of Assisi, 1354
msItem.rubric: Incipit prologus in novam compilationem statutorum generalium ordinis minorum factam apud Asisium in capitulo generali ibi celebrato per rev. p.f. Guilelmum eiusdem ordinis generalem ministrum anno domini 1354 in festo Pentecoste
msItem.explicit: a quolibet layco C. Pater noster (ed. p. 220)

msItem.title: Expositio quatuor magistrorum super regulam fratrum minorum
Ordinances of general congregations of the Franciscan observants of the 'provincia cismontana', c. 1461–1493

msItem.rubric: Infrascripte sunt ordinaciones familie sacre in diversis generalibus congregationibus viz Rome Assisi Aquile Bononie Mediolani item secundo Rome et Ausmi simul in unum reducte in generali congregatione apud Ausmum celebrata a.d. 1461
msItem.note: Ed. A. van den Wyngaert, A.F.H. 16 (1923), 496–506, here wanting cc. 68–70
Ordinances of Ferrara, 1481, listed by can den Wyngaert, A.F.H. 22 (1929), p. 533, no. 7

msItem.rubric: Infrascripta vero ordinata sunt per prefatum rev. p.v. G(uilelmum) et per diffinitores
msItem.note: Florence, 1493, ed. van den Wyngaert, A.F.H. 22, pp. 535–6. Here the first article only follows the title, with the rubric 'verte folium'. The rest of the text is on fol. 34v. Wants articles 8–12.

msItem.title: List of papal grants, Eugenius IV to Sixtus IV
msItem.rubric: Infrascripte sunt gracie concesse per diversos summos pontifices familie cismontane ordinis minorum
Confirmatio priviligiorum per dominum Alexandrum quartum

msItem.title: List of indulgences given to those visiting Franciscan churches
Ordinances of general congregations of the Franciscan observants, c. 1472–1501

msItem.author: Bernardinus of Siena
msItem.title: Commentary on the Franciscan rule
msItem.rubric: S. Bernardini quedam declarationes seu determinationes super regulam
msItem.incipit: In christo sibi carissimis fratribus...Volens mihi amissorum saluti
msItem.note: ed. E. Bulletti, Bullettino di Studi Bernardiniani 4 (1943), pp. 82 sqq. For other editions see D. Pacetti, De S. Bernardini Senensis operibus, Quaracchi, 1947, p. 208, no. 8

msItem.rubric: Quando liceat recurere ad amicum spiritualem pro pecunia exbursanda mutuanda vel donanda fratribus minoribus cum bona conscientia
msItem.incipit: Premitto primo quod declaratio regule nihil aliud est
msItem.explicit: hec breviter dicta iudicio cuiusque rectius sentientis humillime submitto. Ego Hieronymus de Torniellis inter minores minimus.

msItem.author: Gregory IX
msItem.title: Declaration on the Franciscan rule
msItem.rubric: Incipit declaratio gregorii noni super regulam fratrum minorum
msItem.note: Pr. Sbaralea, Bullarium Franciscanum I pp. 68–70 and Firmamentum trium ordinem...Francisci, Paris [1512], pt. IV, fol. 2v-3v.

msItem.author: Nicholas III
msItem.title: Declaration on the Franciscan rule
msItem.note: Latin version pr. Bull. Francisc. III. 404–16, Firmamentum pt. IV fol. 4v-9.

msItem.author: Clement V
msItem.title: Declaration on the Franciscan rule
msItem.note: Latin version pr. Bull. Francisc. V. 80–6, Firmamentum pt. IV fol. 9–12.
Note on accusations by one friar against another before his superior

msItem.author: Bonaventure
msItem.title: Epistola de tribus quaestionibus
msItem.rubric: Declaratio domini sancti Boneventure de Balneo Regio super tribus articulis regule fratrum minorum valde pulcra
Alia quedam declaratio valde pulchra et utilis super tria vota regule
msItem.incipit: Cum de expositione regule agitur non est intelligendum

msItem.title: Questi sono li casi per li qualli el fratre si dito proprietario
msItem.note: Somewhat shorter than the Latin version pr. Firmamentum pt. IV, fol. 178v-179v.

msItem.author: Bartholomaeus de Pisis
msItem.title: De conformitate vitae beati Francisci ad vitam domini Iesu
msItem.note: Extract on the Franciscan rule, pr. Analecta Franciscana, Quaracchi, 1906, IV.381–425.
msItem.rubric: Incipit declaratio regule fratrum minorum secundum dominum magistrum Bartholomeum de Pisis o.f.m. que continetur in libro primo Conformitatum beati Francisci
Epistola Francisci de Bautino duci Andree ad dominum reverendum Antonium (Antonellum) Andritensem episcopum Montis Pilosi
msItem.incipit: Scripturus ego ad te pontificis summi Nicolai quinti progressum

msItem.title: Commentary on the Franciscan rule
msItem.rubric: Incipit quedam brevis expositio et verissima intentio regule edita a sanctis patribus ordinis emendata et collecta de omnibus aliis expositionibus
msItem.incipit: Regula et vita ... Hoc est preceptum ut secundum expositionem quatuor magistrorum
msItem.note: pr. Firmamentum pt. IV fol. 70–2, see also Oliver, Expositio IV magistrorum p. 94

msItem.author: Benedict XII
msItem.title: Declaration on the Franciscan rule
msItem.rubric: Incipiunt ordinationes Benedicti pape XII circa statum fratrum minorum
msItem.note: ed. M. Bihl, A.F.H. 30 (1937), 309–90. Fol. 104–5 are blank.

msItem.title: Privileges granted and confirmed to the Franciscans, 1474

msItem.author: Clement V
msItem.title: Bull Obtentu divini nominis
msItem.note: dated 12th Feb. 1306, with a note by the scribe: 'Hec est copia cuiusdam bulle papalis reperte in archivio ecclesie s. Francisci de Assisio'

msItem.title: Privilegium domini Alexandri pape VI in quo exemptio quarte ordinis fratrum minorum de observantia continetur
msItem.incipit: Dilecti filii... Sacre religionis sub qua devotum

msItem.rubric: Privilegium (Sixti IV) sanctificandi festum... s. Francisci

msItem.title: List of privileges granted to the order by Alexander VI

supportDesc.support: Paper. Watermarks three hills in circle, cf. Briquet 11887*, circle, cf. Briquet 3058, letter S or M.
supportDesc.foliation: Modern pencil: i-iii, 1–122; an original foliation in arabic numerals in red ink, 1–115, included the five leaves now missing after fol. 9, and the leaf now missing after fol. 104, but stops at the present fol. 109.

binding.p: Typical Holkham binding of straight-grained morocco; the spine lettered in gilt 'BENEDICTI | PAPÆ XII | ORDINATIONES' and 'MS | 222'.

history.provenance: fr. Steffano da Isola della Scala , 1646–76: 'Questo libro fu dato a frate Steffano da Isola della Scala chanonico minore assistente dal p. Agyapito da Venezia lett. all' hors in Piove di [...] nel tempore che el detto p. lett. andò nella rifforma 7 Sept. 1646', and 'Ego frater Stephanus qui supra manu propria scripsi' (fol. 119r); and 'Fratris Stephani usui Mantue habitantis 1676 (fol. 119v).
Bookplate of ' THOMAS WILLIAM COKE ', and signed 'Thos. Willm. Coke' (fol. 1r); formerly Norfolk, Holkham Hall, MS. 222.

recordHist.source: Typescript description by Bodleian Library staff, revised by Peter Kidd, late 1990s

revisionDesc.change: James Cummings Up-converted the markup using https://github.com/jamescummings/Bodleian-msDesc-ODD/blob/master/convertTolkien2Bodley.xsl
